ValidationRule.description: SSSW is based on Case Types. These are required for all Cases.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: Bypass_Data_enforcement__c = FALSE && OR( BEGINS(RecordType.DeveloperName, 'SSSW'), CONTAINS(RecordType.DeveloperName, 'Unified') ) && $Profile.Name != 'System Administrator' && ISBLANK(TEXT(Type)) && NOT(ISPICKVAL(Origin, 'Direct Email')) && NOT(ISPICKVAL(Origin, 'Email')) && NOT(ISPICKVAL(Origin, 'Fax')) && NOT(ISPICKVAL(Origin, 'White mail'))
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Please specify a Case Type for this Case.
